name: NRD CS
goal: Assisting in securing Digital Environments for Countries, Organisations and communities. Building national, sectoral and organisational CSIRTs/SOCs
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Cybersecurity frameworks development for national and international needs, corresponding to Critical Information Infrastructure and cybersecurity laws and standards.
